task_description: Generate additional high-quality psychology questions for Week 10 Psychopathology quiz covering underrepresented topics from the lecture slides

phases.name: Question Generation
phases.description: Generate new psychology questions covering underrepresented topics from the slides
deliverables: 15-20 new questions covering: Rosenhan study, delusion types, schizophrenia spectrum disorders, personality disorder scenarios
Questions in correct JSON format with difficulty levels (learning, application, tricky)
Each question has comprehensive explanations for correct and incorrect answers
success_criteria: All questions are clinically accurate based on the PDF slides

phases.name: Final Testing
phases.description: Comprehensive testing of all implemented features. This phase uses chrome-devtools MCP for browser testing, curl for API tests, and runs any existing test suites.
deliverables: All UI features tested via browser automation
All API endpoints tested via curl/integration tests
No critical bugs or regressions found
success_criteria: API responses are correct and performant

task_context.background_context:
The user needs more questions for Week 10 (Psychopathology) of their PSYC 100 quiz app. Current topics have ~46 questions total. Key topics from slides that need more coverage:

1. ROSENHAN STUDY: "On being sane in insane places" - pseudopatients admitted to psychiatric hospitals, staff couldn't distinguish them from real patients, raises questions about validity of psychiatric diagnosis

2. DELUSION TYPES (need more detail):
- Persecutory: being conspired against, spied on, poisoned
- Reference: neutral events have special personal meaning  
- Grandiose: special power, identity, knowledge
- Control delusions: forces controlling thoughts/actions
- Thought delusions: insertion, withdrawal, broadcasting
- Somatic: having physical defect despite negative tests
- Nihilistic: body parts don't exist, one is dead

3. SCHIZOPHRENIA SPECTRUM DISTINCTIONS:
- Schizophrenia: ≥6 months
- Schizophreniform: 1-6 months (same symptoms)
- Schizoaffective: psychosis + mood episodes (key: psychosis occurs WITHOUT mood)
- Brief Psychotic: 1 day to <1 month, full recovery
- Delusional Disorder: circumscribed delusions, normal functioning otherwise

4. PERSONALITY DISORDERS (all 10):
- Cluster A (Odd): Paranoid, Schizoid, Schizotypal
- Cluster B (Dramatic): Antisocial, Borderline, Histrionic, Narcissistic
- Cluster C (Anxious): Avoidant, Dependent, OCPD

Question format must match existing structure:
{
  "question": "Question text?",
  "difficulty": "learning|application|tricky",
  "options": ["A", "B", "C", "D"],
  "answer": "Correct option text exactly",
  "explanation": {
    "correct": "Why this is right",
    "incorrect": {
      "Option A": "Why wrong",
      "Option B": "Why wrong"
    }
  }
}
expected_deliverables: 15-20 new well-crafted psychology questions in JSON format
Questions covering Rosenhan study, delusion types, schizophrenia spectrum, personality disorders
success_criteria: Questions are clinically accurate per DSM-5 and lecture content
Mix of learning, application, and tricky difficulty levels
Explanations teach why correct answer is right AND why each wrong answer is wrong
